Pre-Game Insights: Manolo Márquez expressed excitement and noted the new facilities in Hyderabad.
Defender Roshan Singh Naorem attended the pre-match press conference.
India will have only two training sessions before the first game against Mauritius.
Márquez emphasized the importance of attitude and preparation for the Asian Cup qualifiers.
India's opponents Mauritius are using the Intercontinental Cup for preparation.
Mauritius coach Guillaume Moullec aims to find stability and efficiency in their team.
